detectors.description: LuckyDoubler.rand(uint256) (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#71-76) uses a weak PRNG: "uint256((uint256(hashVal) / factor)) % max (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#75)"

LuckyDoubler.changeOwner(address) (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#77-79) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = newOwner (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#78)

LuckyDoubler.changeMultiplier(uint256) (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#80-84) should emit an event for: 
	- multiplier = multi (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#83)

LuckyDoubler.changeFee(uint256) (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#85-89) should emit an event for: 
	- fee = newFee (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#88)

LuckyDoubler.changeOwner(address).newOwner (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#77) lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = newOwner (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#78)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in LuckyDoubler.join() (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#37-69):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(msg.value - 1000000000000000000) (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#40)
	- theEntry.entryAddress.transfer(payout) (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#56)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balance -= payout (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#59)
	- theEntry.paid = true (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#57)
	- unpaidEntries[index] = unpaidEntries[unpaidEntries.length - 1] (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#61)
	- unpaidEntries.length -- (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#63)
	- users[theEntry.entryAddress].payoutsReceived ++ (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#58)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [LuckyDoubler.join()](bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#L37-L69):
	External calls:
	- [msg.sender.transfer(msg.value - 1000000000000000000)](bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#L40)
	- [theEntry.entryAddress.transfer(payout)](bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#L56)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [balance -= payout](bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#L59)
	- [theEntry.paid = true](bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#L57)
	- [unpaidEntries[index] = unpaidEntries[unpaidEntries.length - 1]](bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#L61)
	- [unpaidEntries.length --](bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#L63)
	- [users[theEntry.entryAddress].payoutsReceived ++](bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#L58)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in LuckyDoubler.join() (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#37-69):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(msg.value - 1000000000000000000) (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#40)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balance += (dValue * (100 - fee)) / 100 (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#51)
	- entries.push(Entry(msg.sender,dValue,(dValue * (multiplier) / 100),false)) (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#48)
	- unpaidEntries.push(entries.length - 1) (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#50)
	- users[msg.sender].id = msg.sender (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#44)
	- users[msg.sender].deposits = 0 (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#45)
	- users[msg.sender].payoutsReceived = 0 (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#46)
	- users[msg.sender].deposits ++ (bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doublerU2.sol#49)
